job_tasks.phrase: Je werkt aan uitdagende projecten waar je technische expertise écht het verschil maakt.

soft_skills.phrase: technische expertise écht het verschil maakt

classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional website and platform development using Liferay. There is no mention of AI, machine learning, generative models, or related technologies, making it irrelevant to the GenAI Engineer profile. It falls under traditional software engineering.
